colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @022A *, ,(CES DPAL YE SHES KYI MKHA' 'GRO MA SENGGE GDONG PA CAN GYI SGO NAS ZHI BA'I SBYIN BSREG BYED TSUL RDO RJE GO CHA ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI BLO BZANG DPAL LDAN YE SHES KYI SLOB MA DGA' CHEN NO MONG HANG RIN PO CHE'I @022B GSUNG GIS BSKUL BA LA BRTEN PA, ^ SH'AKYA'I BTZUN PA BLO BZANG BSTAN 'DZIN GYIS SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI GU SHRI BLO BZANG RIN CHEN NO,, ,,)
